entry.title: China's Quest for Space Power Starts With Moon Dust
entry.content: The country’s lunar program is a key step toward Beijing’s vision of achieving territorial power in space, and scientists think lunar material could one day provide safer nuclear energy in a fusion reactor.

entry.title: Iran Steps Up Deportations of Afghans Trying to Flee Taliban and Poverty
entry.content: A record number of expulsions add to the tension on the Iranian-Afghan border months after the collapse of the U.S.-backed government in Kabul.
